name: TTOS Linux
short_description:
TTOS Linux is designed as an OEM Linux distribution for the TTPC Systems line of computers.  While the software sold on the prototype systems will include proprietary plugins and software licensed from fluendo, the core OS will be distributed for free as the GPL license specifies that it should be available.  The system is just a slightly customized stock debian GNU/Linux.  Please feel free to try, and enjoy!

Kernel: Linux (debian current)
Supported Desktops: GNUstep/KDE
Distribution Type: Rolling Release Updates
Network Config Type: Wicd
Package Manager: apt/aptitude/apt-get/apper/synaptic

Tweaks: Animated 3D Desktop (both TTOS Service Menu's and A KDE Video Wallpaper Tweak)
summary: State of the art Linux Technologies Distribution
